title: DGX Spark Heavy
description: Launch a high-performance Spark container with multi-GPU access and expanded resources.
stackFileContent:
version: '3.8'
services:
  dgx-spark-heavy:
    image: yourregistry/dgx-spark-template:latest
    environment:
      - NVIDIA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=${GPU_DEVICES}
      - USER_ID=${USER_ID}
    volumes:
      - /data/${USER_ID}:/workspace
    deploy:
      resources:
        limits:
          cpus: '8.0'
          memory: 64G
    ports:
      - "8888:8888"
    restart: unless-stopped
